com.navis.framework.portal.context

Interface IThreadContextManager<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICallingContextManager, IRequestContextManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ThreadLocalCallingContextManager, ThreadLocalRequestContextManager

    public interface IThreadContextManager<T>
    Tracking interface for all thread handling Since statics do not support generics, we can't use an abstract class
    Author:
    Heji Kim, Jan 5, 2010

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearContext()
      take context off thread
      T getContext()
      All calling tiers must have placed the context on the tier.
      void setContext(T inContext)
